Articles.Content:
Hello,

I kinda feel like I am overlooking something and this is really a stupid question. Still, I just can't move on with this and any help would be really appreciated:

I cannot save any subassemblies. I just do not have the subassemblies tab which I have seen in some tutorials.

This is my whole interface, playing in science-sandbox mode.

Thanks for the help.

K.

![2mxnbwm.jpg](http://i59.tinypic.com/2mxnbwm.jpg)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-28T11:50:15Z" title="03/28/2015 11:50  AM" data-short="9 yr">March 28, 2015</time> by krotana**

The editor interface changed in 0.90, most tutorials show the old interface.

Click the button at extreme upper left, the one that looks a bit like |||> . A list of categories will appear, at the bottom is the one for subassemblies.

Also, welcome to the forums!

> 
> The editor interface changed in 0.90, most tutorials show the old interface.
> Click the button at extreme upper left, the one that looks a bit like |||> . A list of categories will appear, at the bottom is the one for subassemblies.
> 
> Also, welcome to the forums!

I knew I was missing something ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) thank you!
